item.title: Design Confidence: 5 Non-Designer Hacks to Craft Pro Visuals
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Mike Turko)
item.description:
Ever felt like your designs are shouting when they should whisper?

You’re not alone. In a world where 85% of users form first impressions based on visual content (Stanford Research), even small design tweaks can transform chaos into clarity. Let’s explore five principles to help you create visuals that feel intentional—not accidental.

item.title: 5 Simple Design Hacks to Help Non-Designers Create Professional Results
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Mike Turko)
item.description: Creating professional visuals doesn’t require years of training. Whether you’re designing social posts, flyers, or slides, these five strategic hacks will help you craft polished graphics that command attention. Let’s turn your DIY designs from “meh” to masterpiece.
